description.narrative: 1.4. By 2021, all districts in Zambia have their capacity increased to plan, resource and implement immunization programme for increased coverage of DPT3 vaccination with focus on the hardest to reach and marginalized communities.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 1.4. By 2021, all districts in Zambia have their capacity increased to plan, resource and implement immunization programme for increased coverage of DPT3 vaccination with focus on the hardest to reach and marginalized communities.

description.narrative: The programme maintained adequate stock level of vaccines other than BCG and Td which stocked out during Q1 of 2020. UNICEF supported the Ministry of Health to meet the gaps by resource mobilization which guaranteed security of traditional vaccines for a period of up to 6 months from Q2-Q3 pending MoH internal effort for vaccine procurement. Support was also provided for implementation of the Polio cVDPV outbreak response during Q1 and Q2; and Child Health Week during which IPV catch-up and HPV vaccination campaigns were conducted. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/06/2020
